00025   sass_context* sass_new_context()
00026   { return (sass_context*) calloc(1, sizeof(sass_context)); }
00027 
00028   // helper for safe access to c_ctx
00029   static const char* safe_str (const char* str) {
00030     return str == NULL ? "" : str;
00031   }
00032 
00033   static void copy_strings(const std::vector<std::string>& strings, char*** array, int skip = 0) {
00034     int num = static_cast<int>(strings.size());
00035     char** arr = (char**) malloc(sizeof(char*) * (num + 1));
00036 
00037     for(int i = skip; i < num; i++) {
00038       arr[i-skip] = (char*) malloc(sizeof(char) * (strings[i].size() + 1));
00039       std::copy(strings[i].begin(), strings[i].end(), arr[i-skip]);
00040       arr[i-skip][strings[i].size()] = '\0';
00041     }
00042 
00043     arr[num-skip] = 0;
00044     *array = arr;
00045   }
00046 
00047   static void free_string_array(char ** arr) {
00048     if(!arr)
00049         return;
00050 
00051     char **it = arr;
00052     while (it && (*it)) {
00053       free(*it);
00054       ++it;
00055     }
00056 
00057     free(arr);
00058   }
00059 
00060   void sass_free_context(sass_context* ctx)
00061   {
00062     if (ctx->output_string)     free(ctx->output_string);
00063     if (ctx->source_map_string) free(ctx->source_map_string);
00064     if (ctx->error_message)     free(ctx->error_message);
00065     if (ctx->c_functions)       free(ctx->c_functions);
00066 
00067     free_string_array(ctx->included_files);
00068 
00069     free(ctx);
00070   }
00071 
00072   sass_file_context* sass_new_file_context()
00073   { return (sass_file_context*) calloc(1, sizeof(sass_file_context)); }
00074 
00075   void sass_free_file_context(sass_file_context* ctx)
00076   {
00077     if (ctx->output_string)     free(ctx->output_string);
00078     if (ctx->source_map_string) free(ctx->source_map_string);
00079     if (ctx->error_message)     free(ctx->error_message);
00080     if (ctx->c_functions)       free(ctx->c_functions);
00081 
00082     free_string_array(ctx->included_files);
00083 
00084     free(ctx);
00085   }

00087   sass_folder_context* sass_new_folder_context()
00088   { return (sass_folder_context*) calloc(1, sizeof(sass_folder_context)); }
00089 
00090   void sass_free_folder_context(sass_folder_context* ctx)
00091   {
00092     free_string_array(ctx->included_files);
00093     free(ctx);
00094   }

00096   int sass_compile(sass_context* c_ctx)
00097   {
00098     using namespace Sass;
00099     try {
00100       string input_path = safe_str(c_ctx->input_path);
00101       int lastindex = static_cast<int>(input_path.find_last_of("."));
00102       string output_path;
00103       if (!c_ctx->output_path) {
00104         if (input_path != "") {
00105           output_path = (lastindex > -1 ? input_path.substr(0, lastindex) : input_path) + ".css";
00106         }
00107       }
00108       else {
00109           output_path = c_ctx->output_path;
00110       }
00111       Context cpp_ctx(
00112         Context::Data().source_c_str(c_ctx->source_string)
00113                        .output_path(output_path)
00114                        .output_style((Output_Style) c_ctx->options.output_style)
00115                        .is_indented_syntax_src(c_ctx->options.is_indented_syntax_src)
00116                        .source_comments(c_ctx->options.source_comments)
00117                        .source_map_file(safe_str(c_ctx->options.source_map_file))
00118                        .source_map_root(safe_str(c_ctx->options.source_map_root))
00119                        .source_map_embed(c_ctx->options.source_map_embed)
00120                        .source_map_contents(c_ctx->options.source_map_contents)
00121                        .omit_source_map_url(c_ctx->options.omit_source_map_url)
00122                        .include_paths_c_str(c_ctx->options.include_paths)
00123                        .plugin_paths_c_str(c_ctx->options.plugin_paths)
00124                        // .include_paths_array(0)
00125                        // .plugin_paths_array(0)
00126                        .include_paths(vector<string>())
00127                        .plugin_paths(vector<string>())
00128                        .precision(c_ctx->options.precision ? c_ctx->options.precision : 5)
00129                        .indent(c_ctx->options.indent ? c_ctx->options.indent : "  ")
00130                        .linefeed(c_ctx->options.linefeed ? c_ctx->options.linefeed : LFEED)
00131       );
00132       if (c_ctx->c_functions) {
00133         Sass_Function_List this_func_data = c_ctx->c_functions;
00134         while ((this_func_data) && (*this_func_data)) {
00135           cpp_ctx.c_functions.push_back(*this_func_data);
00136           ++this_func_data;
00137         }
00138       }
00139       c_ctx->output_string = cpp_ctx.compile_string();
00140       c_ctx->source_map_string = cpp_ctx.generate_source_map();
00141       c_ctx->error_message = 0;
00142       c_ctx->error_status = 0;
00143 
00144       copy_strings(cpp_ctx.get_included_files(1), &c_ctx->included_files, 1);
00145     }
00146     catch (Sass_Error& e) {
00147       stringstream msg_stream;
00148       msg_stream << e.pstate.path << ":" << e.pstate.line << ": " << e.message << endl;
00149       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00150       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00151       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00152       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00153     }
00154     catch(bad_alloc& ba) {
00155       stringstream msg_stream;
00156       msg_stream << "Unable to allocate memory: " << ba.what() << endl;
00157       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00158       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00159       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00160       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00161     }
00162     catch (std::exception& e) {
00163       stringstream msg_stream;
00164       msg_stream << "Error: " << e.what() << endl;
00165       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00166       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00167       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00168       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00169     }
00170     catch (string& e) {
00171       stringstream msg_stream;
00172       msg_stream << "Error: " << e << endl;
00173       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00174       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00175       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00176       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00177     }
00178     catch (...) {
00179       // couldn't find the specified file in the include paths; report an error
00180       stringstream msg_stream;
00181       msg_stream << "Unknown error occurred" << endl;
00182       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00183       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00184       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00185       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00186     }
00187     return 0;
00188   }

00190   int sass_compile_file(sass_file_context* c_ctx)
00191   {
00192     using namespace Sass;
00193     try {
00194       string input_path = safe_str(c_ctx->input_path);
00195       int lastindex = static_cast<int>(input_path.find_last_of("."));
00196       string output_path;
00197       if (!c_ctx->output_path) {
00198           output_path = (lastindex > -1 ? input_path.substr(0, lastindex) : input_path) + ".css";
00199       }
00200       else {
00201           output_path = c_ctx->output_path;
00202       }
00203       Context cpp_ctx(
00204         Context::Data().entry_point(input_path)
00205                        .output_path(output_path)
00206                        .output_style((Output_Style) c_ctx->options.output_style)
00207                        .is_indented_syntax_src(c_ctx->options.is_indented_syntax_src)
00208                        .source_comments(c_ctx->options.source_comments)
00209                        .source_map_file(safe_str(c_ctx->options.source_map_file))
00210                        .source_map_root(safe_str(c_ctx->options.source_map_root))
00211                        .source_map_embed(c_ctx->options.source_map_embed)
00212                        .source_map_contents(c_ctx->options.source_map_contents)
00213                        .omit_source_map_url(c_ctx->options.omit_source_map_url)
00214                        .include_paths_c_str(c_ctx->options.include_paths)
00215                        .plugin_paths_c_str(c_ctx->options.plugin_paths)
00216                        // .include_paths_array(0)
00217                        // .plugin_paths_array(0)
00218                        .include_paths(vector<string>())
00219                        .plugin_paths(vector<string>())
00220                        .precision(c_ctx->options.precision ? c_ctx->options.precision : 5)
00221                        .indent(c_ctx->options.indent ? c_ctx->options.indent : "  ")
00222                        .linefeed(c_ctx->options.linefeed ? c_ctx->options.linefeed : LFEED)
00223       );
00224       if (c_ctx->c_functions) {
00225         Sass_Function_List this_func_data = c_ctx->c_functions;
00226         while ((this_func_data) && (*this_func_data)) {
00227           cpp_ctx.c_functions.push_back(*this_func_data);
00228           ++this_func_data;
00229         }
00230       }
00231       c_ctx->output_string = cpp_ctx.compile_file();
00232       c_ctx->source_map_string = cpp_ctx.generate_source_map();
00233       c_ctx->error_message = 0;
00234       c_ctx->error_status = 0;
00235 
00236       copy_strings(cpp_ctx.get_included_files(), &c_ctx->included_files);
00237     }
00238     catch (Sass_Error& e) {
00239       stringstream msg_stream;
00240       msg_stream << e.pstate.path << ":" << e.pstate.line << ": " << e.message << endl;
00241       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00242       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00243       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00244       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00245     }
00246     catch(bad_alloc& ba) {
00247       stringstream msg_stream;
00248       msg_stream << "Unable to allocate memory: " << ba.what() << endl;
00249       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00250       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00251       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00252       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00253     }
00254     catch (std::exception& e) {
00255       stringstream msg_stream;
00256       msg_stream << "Error: " << e.what() << endl;
00257       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00258       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00259       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00260       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00261     }
00262     catch (string& e) {
00263       stringstream msg_stream;
00264       msg_stream << "Error: " << e << endl;
00265       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00266       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00267       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00268       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00269     }
00270     catch (...) {
00271       // couldn't find the specified file in the include paths; report an error
00272       stringstream msg_stream;
00273       msg_stream << "Unknown error occurred" << endl;
00274       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00275       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00276       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00277       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00278     }
00279     return 0;
00280   }
